name: Red Faction Guerrilla Re-Mars-tered
description: Red Faction: Guerrilla re-defines the limits of destruction-based game-play with a huge open-world, fast-paced guerrilla-style combat, and true physics-based destruction.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 (64bit) Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU 2.5 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 Feature Level AMD or NVIDIA Card with 1 GB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 32 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 (64bit) Processor: Intel or AMD Quad Core CPU 3 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 Feature Level AMD or NVIDIA Card with 2 GB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 32 GB available space
